title: XenServer
description: XenServer is and always has been based on open source software, and going forward it will be built using the upstream codebase from the Linux Foundation's  Xen Project. XenServer is a Linux distribution that is based on the Xen hypervisor, the Linux kernel, and the CentOS Linux distribution and user tools.

title: Octoblu
description: Octoblu enables companies to create IoT services with secure real-time exchange of data. The services are built an open communications and management platform that supports a variety of protocols for physical devices to communicate seamlessly with each other, people, legacy applications, and cloud services.
